snippet.title: Garden Buddies | Release Trailer | Steam & Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Unleash your inner gardener and immerse yourself in the serene world of Garden Buddies, cultivating a vibrant flower garden alongside your new friend Mutsy. Discover an enchanting and fulfilling experience to release your stress.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2429090/Garden_Buddies/
Nintendo eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/garden-buddies-switch/

Don't forget to follow us on 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RedDeer_Games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedDeerGames
and Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/reddeer_games/
